document_data.name: ''Dove's Harp''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dove's harps''''' were enchanted musical instruments of [[elf|elven]] creation, named after the similar item owned by [[Dove Falconhand]], with the true name lost to the ages.
document_data.Description: ''Dove's harp'' was a rectangular masterwork [[harp]] with a number of strings between twenty and thirty six.
document_data.Powers: When ''Dove's harp'' was played, all creatures within {{SI|20'|'"|long=yes}} were temporarily cured of any effects or spells that caused insanity (similarly to the ''[[greater restoration]]'' spell) as well as received effects of the ''[[calm emotions]]'' spell. Creatures that listened to the harp's music for at least 12 seconds also received the effects of the ''[[cure light wounds]]'' (this power can only affect a creature once per [[tenday]]). As the harp was played, the harpist radiated magical ''[[light]]''.
document_data.Creation: ''Dove's harps'' could be created by an individual proficient in crafting wondrous items, and had access to ''calm emotions'', ''greater restoration'', ''[[healing circle]]'', and ''light'' spells.
